sentences.chinese: 十一月乙丑，御史大夫楊敞為丞相，封安平侯。
sentences.literal: Eleventh month yichou, Imperial Secretary Yang Chang as Chancellor, enfeoffed Anping Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 九月庚寅，衛尉平陵侯范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
sentences.literal: Ninth month gengyin, Guard Commander Pingling Marquis Fan Mingyou as Cross-Liao General, attacked Wuwan.

sentences.chinese: 九月戊戌，御史大夫蔡義為丞相，封陽平侯。
sentences.literal: Ninth month wuxu, Imperial Secretary Cai Yi as Chancellor, enfeoffed Yangping Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 四月甲申，光祿大夫龍镪侯韓曾為前將軍。五月丁酉，水衡都尉趙充國為後將軍，右將軍張安世為車騎將軍。
sentences.literal: Fourth month jiashen, Palace Steward Longqiang Marquis Han Zeng as Front General. Fifth month dingyou, Water Works Commandant Zhao Chongguo as Rear General, Right General Zhang Anshi as Chariot Cavalry General.

sentences.chinese: 御史大夫昌水侯田廣明。
sentences.literal: Imperial Secretary Changshui Marquis Tian Guangming.
Filial Xuan Ben Shi first year

sentences.chinese: 七月庚寅，御史大夫田廣明為祁連將軍，龍镪侯韓曾為後將軍，營平侯趙充國為蒲類將軍，度遼將軍平陵侯范明友為雲中太守，富民侯田順為虎牙將軍：皆擊匈奴。
sentences.literal: Seventh month gengyin, Imperial Secretary Tian Guangming as Qilian General, Longqiang Marquis Han Zeng as Rear General, Yingping Marquis Zhao Chongguo as Pulei General, Cross-Liao General Pingling Marquis Fan Mingyou as Yunzhong Governor, Fumin Marquis Tian Shun as Tiger Fang General: all attacked Xiongnu.
